extDescription.message: Pops up a bookmarks menu with the click of a button.  Manage you bookmarks right from the bookmarks menu.

popupSearchBookmarks.description: Text to display in search field when no text has been entered by the user

popupDelete.description: Text for Delete buttons throughout popup

popupCancel.description: Text for Cancel buttons throughout popup

popupName.description: Text for Name fields throughout popup

popupSave.description: Text for Save buttons throughout popup

popupCreateFolder.description: Title text for Create New Folder window

popupEditFolder.description: Title text for Edit Folder window

popupDeleteBookmark.description: Title text for Delete Bookmark window

popupDeleteFolder.description: Title text for Delete Folder window

popupDeleteConfirm.message: Are you sure you want to delete this item?

popupCtxMenuEdit.description: Text for Edit option in context menu
